de.en: In July 1449, Esen Taishi launched a large-scale, three-pronged invasion of the Ming with his puppet khagan Toqtaq-Buqa.
de.zh: 1449年7月，也先太师挟持傀儡可汗岱總汗对明朝发动了三管齐下的大规模入侵。

de.en: The theme of this map is large scale mountains and oceans. There is a large river meandering into the sea in the western part of the map, forming a fertile delta named 'Buyaga River'. It has many tributaries, creating forests, hills, plains, etc. in the vast mountains for people to build cities. In addition to the Buyaga River, there are many rivers in the map that flow between the mountains, some flowing into the sea, and some flowing into inland lakes in the basin. There is a large saltwater lake in the northeast corner of the map, surrounded by plains, hills, and forests, and beyond that, there are mountains that cannot be seen. People here are also accustomed to living in isolation in the basin and are not as keen on war as the countries along the Buyaga River. There is a lot more to be said in the mountains, but now I want to talk about the sea. The coast here is not straight, there is a large opening made by the Buyaga River in the west, and there is a large peninsula almost entirely composed of mountains in the east. People living in the coastal areas are lucky, because they are close to the south and the sea, they can enjoy the warmer sunshine, the warm and humid water vapor from the sea, and the food presented by the sea. There are many small islands in the sea, most of which are small and rugged, and difficult to live in. However, there is a large island in the southwest, with mountains, hills, and large fertile grasslands. People who live here do not know. What is hunger, do not know what is sadness, they created their own powerful marine civilization.
de.zh: 这张地图的主题是大比例的山群与海洋。有一条大河在西部蜿蜒着流入大海，形成肥沃的三角洲，被命名为“布亚加河”。它拥有着众多的支流，在茫茫一片的山岭中为人们创造了可以建立城市居住的森林、丘陵、平原等。除了布亚加河，地图中还有许多河流淌在山间，有些汇入大海，有些则流入盆地中的内陆湖泊。东北角就有一个很大的咸水湖，周围有着平原和丘陵、森林，再往外就是望不到边的大山。这里的人们也习惯了盆地中与世隔绝的生活，不像布亚加河沿岸的国家那样热衷于战争。山中可以说的还有很多，不过现在我要说一说海。这里的海岸算不上平直，西部有一个布亚加河造成的大口子，东部还有一个几乎完全由山地组成的大型半岛。居住在沿海一带的人们是幸运的，因为靠南、靠海，他们可以享受更加温暖和煦的阳光、暖湿的来自大海的水汽，以及大海馈赠的食物。大海中还有许多小岛，大多很小，且地势崎岖，难以居住，不过西南面有一个大岛，上面有山、有丘陵，更有大块的富饶的草原，在这里居住的人们不知道什么叫饥饿，不知道什么叫忧愁，他们创造了属于自己的强大的海洋文明。

maps.mn: Daming vs Pirates by Mao Suo

de.en: In 2050 a machine was made that would cool the world and stop global warming. Unfortunately it worked a bit too well and the entire world froze. In 2150 the world begins unfreezing but the people lost a lot of modern tech.
de.zh: 2050 年，制造了一台可以为世界降温并阻止全球变暖的机器。 不幸的是，它工作得有点太好了，整个世界都冻结了。 2150 年，世界开始解冻，但人们失去了许多现代科技。

de.en: A premeditated storm swept the people who strayed into the waters to various small artificial floating islands. In order to survive, the people on the floating islands had to kill each other...
de.zh: 一场有预谋的大风暴将误入此海域的人们冲散到各个小小的人造浮岛上，为了活着，各个浮岛上的人们不得不互相厮杀...

de.en: At 6:00 on February 19, 1945, the U.S. landing force arrived in the waters northwest of Iwo Jima... The Japanese army had already built strong fortifications on Iwo Jima, waiting for the arrival of the U.S. military.
de.zh: 1945年2月19日6:00，美军登陆部队到达硫磺岛西北海域...日军早已在硫磺岛构筑严密的防御工事等待着美军到来。

maps.mn: Knights on the Sea by Li FengTong

de.en: In 1943, with the continuous defeat of the Japanese army in the Pacific battlefield, the base camp decided to concentrate most of the fleet and fight the US military to the death. In response to this decisive battle, the U.S. military also assembled a large number of fleets, but due to lack of time, these fleets were scattered in various sea areas. If the fleet is not concentrated as soon as possible, I am afraid that it will be defeated by the Japanese army one by one. We are the last hope in the Pacific theater. Only those who are not afraid of death deserve to live!
de.zh: 1943年，随着日军在太平洋战场的不断溃败，大本营决定集中大部分舰队与美军决一死战。美军为了应对这场决战，也集结了大量舰队，但因时间不足，这些舰队分散在各个海域。若不趁早集中舰队，恐怕会被日军逐个击破。我们是太平洋战场上最后的希望。只有不怕死的人才配活着！

de.en: In June 1950, the Korean War broke out. China and the United States experienced five large-scale battles, which lasted for three years, and finally signed the Korean Armistice Agreement near the 38th parallel.
de.zh: 1950年6月，朝鲜战争爆发，中美经历了5次大规模战役，历时三年，最终在三八线附近签订了朝鲜停战协定。

de.en: The moon has been an object that humans have wanted to conquer since ancient times. A mysterious oriental will has transformed the moon to have the conditions of the earth. The ocean is filled with the moon, and the deepest depth is 3000m, which is based on the lowest altitude on the lunar surface. The craters on the moon are proof that countless meteorites have been blocked for the earth, and now they also breed oceans, forming a unique geographical environment. But a large number of craters also hindered access to water, and meteorites also shattered the terrain, leaving plains scarce. Forests also took over water sources one step ahead of humans. But the resources are still very rich. At the same time, MC players told us: If you want to get rich, you must first hit the tree.
de.zh: 月球自古以来一直是人类想征服的对象。某神秘东方意志改造了月球使之拥有了地球的条件，海洋填充了月球，最深深度为3000m，是以月球表面最低海拔处为基准。月球上的环形山是为地球挡下无数陨石的证明，现在也孕育了海洋，形成了独特的地理环境。但是大量的环形山也阻碍了取水，陨石也使得地形破碎，平原稀少。森林也比人类先一步占领了水源。但是资源还是十分丰富的，同时MC玩家告诉我们：想致富先撸树(￣▽￣)。

de.en: The lost continent of Mu in the Pacific Ocean. Where does the terrain come from? (￣▽￣) It is enough to move the topography of the Pacific Ocean and the existing islands into mountains.
de.zh: 太平洋上失落的姆大陆。地形哪里来？(￣▽￣)搬太平洋海底地形并且现有岛屿成山就可以。

maps.mn: Planet Orion GX1467 by Gu TingWei

de.en: When your or other country's launch plans are destroyed by you, have you ever wondered where the spaceships that have been launched go? They start a new cycle on a new planet. The north and south poles are no longer barriers. You think that the continent is one big and two small, but this young planet has only one continent from beginning to end.
de.zh: 当你或者其他国家的发射计划被你摧毁时，你有想过已经发射的飞船去了哪里吗？他们在新的星球开启了新的轮回。南北极不再是屏障，你以为大陆是一大两小两块大陆，但从始至终这颗年轻的星球只有一块大陆。

de.en: In 218 BC, the second Punic War broke out between Carthage and Rome, but not only Carthage and Rome, but also a huge alliance formed by tribes lurking nearby. The fuse of the war has been ignited, no one can avoid being affected by this war, and fight back for the homeland! As long as there are foreigners standing in the country, we will never surrender!
de.zh: 公元前218年，迦太基与罗马爆发了第二次布匿战争，但参战方不仅仅有迦太基、罗马，还有潜伏在附近的部落组建的庞大联盟。战争的火索已经被引燃，无人可以避免遭受这场战争的波及，为了家园奋起反击！只要国土内还站着外国人，我们绝不投降！

maps.mn: Quick Multiplayer Match by Patrick Lewsza

de.en: Since modern times, Northeast China has been the focus of contention between Japan and Russia. In 1904, Japan did not declare war, raided Lushun during the training of the Russian Navy's Far East Squadron stationed in Lushun, and landed in Inchon. The angry Tsarist Russia transferred the elite troops of East Siberia and the Baltic Fleet to the Far East and declared war on Japan. Thus began the Russian War. At the same time, the Qing Empire declared that both were allies and thus remained neutral. The war was ultimately won by Japan, and the Treaty of Portsmouth was signed with Russia under the coordination of the United Kingdom. But in this parallel world, there are historical observers who faithfully observe and record history.
de.zh: 近代以来，中国东北一直是日俄两国争夺的焦点。1904年，日本不宣而战，在驻扎在旅顺的俄罗斯海军远东分舰队训练时突袭旅顺，并登陆仁川，愤怒的沙俄将东西伯利亚的精锐部队和波罗的海舰队调援远东，并向日本宣战，日俄战争就此打响。与此同时，清帝国宣布两者皆为友邦，因此保持中立。战争最终以日本胜利，并在英国的协调下与沙俄签订了《朴茨茅斯条约》。但在这个平行世界，却存在着忠实观察并记录历史的历史观察者。

maps.mn: World War II Asia by ZhangYaWen
